website_summaries.verdict: While it does a great job as an overall air purifier, we believe pet owners will benefit most from its odor-trapping filtration system.
pros: HEPA filter designed for long-term use
Includes two carbon zeolite filters for pet odors
ft. Works in vertical or horizontal positions
Captures particles as small as 3 microns
cons: Exhaust port close to air intake - not an efficient design

customer_reviews.title: Great for Homes with Pets and Smokers!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with these... enough that I bought two for my house and one for my mother's house! We have one big (mastiff) dog, and a couple small dogs, plus three cats. I placed in the laundry room (where the cat box is) and in the living room (where the dog beds are) and within 48 hours I couldn't even tell we had pets! My husband also smokes in the house, and we can tell a definite improvement in the air quality and freshness. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: RoundGoatCrafts

customer_reviews.title: Works very well near the Litter Box
customer_reviews.text: Really helps by the cats litter box. I have a pair of Maine Coons, and they do tend to have strong litter box odors. (They weigh just over 50# for the pair, big boys to say the least!)
customer_reviews.author: dpast

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it does for me, less dust
customer_reviews.text: While this might not be a true hepa, it is what I could afford. I have run thisfor 4 months and am happy. I keep this in my bedroom, while I am awake I run it on high, when I go to sleep it is on whisper, and if I am just hanging out, medium. I have replaced and vacuumed per the instructions, and have noticed the amount of dust in my room reduce. No pets, no kids, very happy and lives alone. The less amount of dusting I have to do, wonderful now.
customer_reviews.author: S K Hoppe

customer_reviews.title: It worked well for a few weeks - not anymore
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for about two weeks, and then it started emitting a burning smell. I am currently trying to get a replacement from Hamilton Beach, but the process is slow going since each email takes several days to get a reply.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Permanent filter is not permanent
customer_reviews.text: As another reviewer pointed out, the permanent filter is cardboard and will not stand up to washing. On high setting, the noise level was abominable, but did clear the air. At normal setting, I could see no improvement in air quality over time; the filter trapped a small amount of dust over a few months. Moreover, the motor produced a huge amount of EMF that set off my detectors even at low settings from several feet away. This might work ok in a very small room with low levels of air contaminants. Impractical for any other use.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Huber

customer_reviews.title: Missing HEPA filter
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed!! The HEPA filter was not in the box!!!! The worst part is having to call Hamilton Beach to try and get my filter. I am absolutely not waiting 20 min to get customer service agents. I had to buy the filters separate for 18$ more. Thanks Hamilton Beach.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo E

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again. Doesn’t do anything.
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats and two dogs in a small house, and sometimes the fur and dander and other normal allergens bug me, so I decided to get this air cleaner to help. I’ve had it for about two months, and honestly I don’t think it does anything. I check the filter every once in a while to see what it’s picking up and there’s a little bit of dirt and dust and whatever in the folds, but running on medium 24/7 for 2 months with 4 animals and lots of dust from tracked in mud, it should pick up more. I wouldn’t buy again or recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My wife was looking forward to this since she has ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife was looking forward to this since she has been dealing with allergies for a month and when she opened it yesterday, it was all broken pieces. Will definitely returning this defective product. They need to improve their packaging.
customer_reviews.author: John Reyes

customer_reviews.title: You'd better buy a carbon filter, too!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, but the "permanent" hepa filter is pleated (unlike the image in the description). No way you're going to be able to vacuum this. Fortunately, I had already bought a six pack of disposable carbon pre-filters already pre-cut to fit this unit. (Easy to find on Amazon). There's enough room for the carbon pre-filter to fit along with the hepa filter and it seems to be working fine. I'll add an addendum, when it comes time to clean the filter.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Works so well that I don't need to take my allergy medication.
customer_reviews.text: Got this because I seem to be allergic to something in my brother's house. I'm using it in the guest bedroom and it's working so well that I don't need to take my allergy medication. Great price, too. I also followed one user's suggestion and got the air filters (from Loew's hardware) that you put over heating vents. Trim one to size and put it in front of the supplied filter for extra filtration.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Makes no difference.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work well at all. All it does is make a very loud fan noise, and I haven't noticed any change in dust, there's a constant layer forming immediately around the machine and all around the room it's in. Works well if you're just looking for some white noise, but if you're trying to filter you air, I can't recommend this. I missed the return window by a few days, if I hadn't spent so long trying to move it around and see if it would change anything, I definitely would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made no difference in the room at all
customer_reviews.text: I honestly hate this product. This purifier was so disappointing in all kinds of ways. I’m shocked it has such good reviews on Amazon. Dust collects around and even on the product itself, it doesn’t seem like it gets into the filter at all. Doesn’t help with odors. I have it sitting on my nightstand in my bedroom to help with dog dander since my two Great Danes sleep in the room at night and makes the room feel stuffy. I feel like I leave this product running for nothing but a waste of electricity. No difference was made to the room at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing how much visible dust, dog hair and whatever else it is that it pulls out of the air. I use a black carbon prefilter with this and I have to take it out and clean it ever week because the stuff it pulls out of the air is a great big white ring on the black prefilter. It's pretty quite on the low setting and easy to sleep with. Gets louder as you turn it up but still not very loud, Work Awesome. My husband has asthma and this has really helped him breath better in the house, especially when it gets smoky outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: These work great. For the first time since allergy season started, I'm not wheezing & running for inhalers constantly. Noticed a big difference after just the first hour, after a few days the dog fur constantly flying around this house became MUCH less. Highly recommended if you have pets!
customer_reviews.author: MikeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: A Great Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a reliable air purifier, but from all appearances this does nothing but run. I have seen nothing that appears to make the air fresher or purer, and if you turn this item to a higher speed it makes a grinding or unstable sound. I expected better, and now I have learned a lesson. This seems like a flimsy item that achieves nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: No impact
customer_reviews.text: Two cats, litter box in bedroom in basement. No difference in smell with this filter. Only noticeable change is that it is loud. Was skeptical after reading some reviews but desperate so I tried anyway. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ariane

customer_reviews.title: Good size for a room & good price
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and it runs very quiet on medium & low speeds. Little distracting on high. I requested that it be shipped in plain box but it came in the package box with the picture on it. Thought I ordered the 3 pack of filters at the same time but evidently not. Had to go back to order them. The instruction manual shows pictures for inserting the filters but should probably be more specific about how the filter holders just pop out (very easy). I'm always reluctant to pull on anything made of plastic but the holders bend easily; same for the permanent prefilter. Satisfied for the reasonable price. Will see how it works long term.
customer_reviews.author: Josie's mom

customer_reviews.title: adorable but a lot for my litterbox to handle
customer_reviews.text: Litterbox game changer! I've been fostering a litter of 4 kittens, adorable but a lot for my litterbox to handle! To make matters more intense I live in a studio apartment, the litter box is in the only bathroom right off the kitchen which led to some frustration for sure, this fixed it!
customer_reviews.author: Macy

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: We put this in our bathroom, it's not a large space so we thought it would be best there. It's not very good at cleaning the air, odors especially smoke are still present, the unit is noisy and actually quite loud on the highest setting. The "lifetime" HEPA air filter inside of it is a cheesy cardboard constructed rectangle that isn't going to last through another vacuuming. Save your money and get something else. I should have applied the money I spent on this toward a bigger model that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Broken piece of trash
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this a few months ago. Now it no longer works. I should have sent it back after having it a few days when I didnt smell any difference in the air. I thought it was me. No. It never worked in the first place to get rid of odors. Now I am stuck with a machine that does not work.
customer_reviews.author: WILL

customer_reviews.title: Not quiet at all, even on low. Motor makes ticking noise randomly, but a light tap makes it go away
customer_reviews.text: Unit works as intended, but by no means it is quiet, even on the lowest setting. You can hear it sucking in the air from a mile away on low. Not sure how others are saying it's quiet when it's clearly not. At least my unit is loud. Also, randomly it'll start having a ticking noise from the motor or something. A light tap to it makes the ticking noise go away. I try to let this run 24/7 but at night the ticking noise can wake me up and I have to reach over and give it a light tap. It does collect dust so I'll give it 2 stars, but by no means is this quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Neat performance out of an air pirifier at this price
customer_reviews.text: This air purifier has worked wonders in our home. My family has a variety of allergies and a very large and furry dog. I purchased our first one over a year ago and it has help dramatically reduce the dust and other allergens in the air of our bedroom. I couldn't be happier with that purchase. It runs 24/7 and is still as quiet as on day one. We loves this so much that we purchases a second one last week for our lower level of the home to clean and circulate air on our family room. You cant beat this performance for the price of under $50.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Allergies, I CAN BREATH
customer_reviews.text: I have had horrible allergies from dust and pollen from childhood to now. I would get “allergy shots” but nothing really helped. I would simply ignore all my symptoms and tell my self out of site out of mind. That ends now! This isn’t a magic tool and may not work for everyone but it’s worked damn well for me. No more congestion or coughing like crazy in the morning. The air in my room feels light and fresh! I sleep with it on whisper mode and before bed use medium. I don’t turn it on when I’m gone just cause I don’t know if it’s ok or not but just at night works well!
customer_reviews.author: Jackson Mane

customer_reviews.title: Worst purifier I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Literally the worst air purifier I've owned. I put in our very small bathroom and it honestly did nothing. We had a litterbox in there and it did nothing to mask the smell or purify any of the air. I tried using it by my desk in a very small office and nothing! I just don't get it. I've had other purifiers but this just didnt work or even help.
customer_reviews.author: Daniiii

customer_reviews.title: NO LITTER BOX SMELL! NONE! — even right beside littler box!
customer_reviews.text: I fully expected this to not work at all and to return it. I have my cat's litter box in the garage with a cat door between the garage and laundry room. I just adopted two cats and they would not go through the cat door if the flaps were down. With the flaps removed, the smell of the litter box was heavy in the laundry room, which also wafted into the kitchen! YUCK! I received this and plugged it in. The next morning, there was NO smell — not even standing right next to the cat door. No smell at all. I still can't believe it!
customer_reviews.author: FullCatastrophe

customer_reviews.title: After a couple months I bought a better vacuum and that was seems to have solved my ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this hoping it would keep the pet hair down in my house. I think it is about 1% effective for that task because I find very little pet hair in the filter. After a couple months I bought a better vacuum and that was seems to have solved my crazy pet hair problem. This filter is very quiet unless you turn it up to the high setting. I think it will be a perfect little background noise maker for my bedroom to help my wife not hear other noises when she has to sleep through the day after working nights.
customer_reviews.author: Reasonable

customer_reviews.title: Chronic cough gone in 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Idk what else to even say. I smoke weed like a chimney and while the delicious smell is still there the dust caused by the smoke is not. I live in a home built in the 30s with asbestos all up in this b*tch. I was suffering from such a bad cough I was about to Er myself over fear of cancer. Bought this thang because I am poor af and my cough disappeared in 3 weeks. If you want it to remove smells gfys. But if you need dust particals removed from the air you breathe this thing is king for the price. Less noise than a box fan too.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy The Stahl

customer_reviews.title: Just ok, not bad, not great.
customer_reviews.text: It's just ok, doesn't do enough for my 1 small room it's used for though. It does help but it doesn't do enough for me to say I'm just completely in love with it either. Reading the reviews I'm guessing people didn't test the product to really see the difference it was making. It's not a total bust, just not as good as many reviews had me hoping for. I don't regret the purchase but I do wonder what competitor products would've delivered more bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this specifically for the pet component. In just a few days, our room (where they all sleep) had noticeably less hair, there was no trace of odor and the room just had a cleaner feel. The machine is very quiet and the noise it produces is almost a white noise, so it’s nice to go to sleep to. The only thing that didn’t work as described was the blister pack that is supposed to have the indicator to show when the filters should be changed. Could be user error, but even if the line were there, it looks a little tacky on top of the machine. Definitely not a deal breaker though. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsham

customer_reviews.title: Helped with dust irritation
customer_reviews.text: Wow I love this filter, we have a forced air heating system and the dust didn't seem to bad but I had been coughing alot at night and using Nadal spray alot. The very night I started using this in my bedroom all that stopped. There is dust already visible on the outer charcoal filter after only three days of use. Very nice white noise for sleeping. I have already bought a second excited to have another one going at the other end of the house. This unit is also great because it's simple. Very little to replace so not alot if additional cost or harm to the environment.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Live, love this air purifier.
customer_reviews.text: What a game changer! I have two large dogs (70 lbs and 60 lbs) a cat (15lbs ,don't freak out she's not fat just a big cat-vet approved) and a human and they all shed. My house was smelling so much that dog smell, and after a while I was sneezing,my friends who came over were sneezing. I was vacuuming everyday,using dehumidifiers everywhere which made my plants unhappy. I've used this for a few months before giving a review. NO SMELL . NO MORE SNEEZING. Here's the thing , I have a fairly large living room! The quick clean setting can be a little loud, but so what? This was totally worth?
customer_reviews.author: Mowgli

customer_reviews.title: “Permanent” filters = FALSE
customer_reviews.text: A few months post purchase (May to September), I revisited this listing to look into ordering replacement filters because ours have become filthy, and realized the listing described the factory filters as PERMANENT. I did not receive permanent filters. The rims on mine are cardboard and vacuuming does absolutely nothing in terms of cleaning the filter. Pretty disappointed I didn’t notice this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Brown

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely essential for wildfire season
customer_reviews.text: Living on the W coast, the wildfires have been a nightmare. Although living with the smoke is nothing compared to the individuals who are struggling with loss of family members or their home, it's been difficult to sleep with the amount of 2.5 PPM grade smoke in the air creating coughing and watery and irritated eyes. This filter has been amazing at filtering the bedroom, quietly producing fresh air. I haven't had to clean the filter yet but it seems like i'll have to be careful when taking it out. I bought 2 more from their website for downstairs and my parents.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Get clean air without breaking the bank
customer_reviews.text: Definitely get your bang for your buck! I have noticed my morning throat aches are gone and my daughters allergies have gotten better since we have been keeping this in the bedroom. I sometimes run it high throughout the day but normally I keep it on low 24/7. At night, the low setting has become our white noise machine! And let me tell you, you will be amazing when you check the filter every week! I highly recommend for a high quality filter that doesn't break the bank. You and your family deserve clean air.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: For Cats With Asthma!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for my cat who has asthma. I moved into a big dusty house that’s impossible to keep clean, which has caused some pretty bad asthma flare ups. I put this in my bedroom, which is the room she’s mostly in, and within a couple days her asthma symptoms were almost non existent! I couldn’t be happier! I plan on buying at least a couple more to place throughout the house. Definitely recommend for anyone (including fur babies) with breathing issues!
customer_reviews.author: B. Chafins

customer_reviews.title: The Hamilton Beach 04384 Air Purifier Is Poorly Engineered
customer_reviews.text: The Hamilton Beach 04384 Air Purifier is neither quiet nor an efficient animal hair filter. The small air filter on my desktop computer collects more pet hair than the Hamilton Beach (and they share the same room). The air flow passes through the odor eliminator before the HEPA filter. If it had collected any animal hair, the odor eliminator would have screened it prior to reaching the cleanable HEPA filter. Running at half speed the Hamilton Beach is far noisier than my gaming computer which has five fans. I wish that I would have known what I know now prior to purchasing this animal hair filter. Had I known, I would have never purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Notso

customer_reviews.title: I checked the filter and it collected a lot of dirty particles from the air and possible cat dandruff
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in my life is allergic to cats. I thought this would be a reasonable priced air purifier for my studio apartment. After having it for about two months, I checked the filter and it collected a lot of dirty particles from the air and possible cat dandruff. My boyfriend who visits and is allergic to my cat, was not as stuffy or congested compared to when I didn't have the air purifier. So it works, but I wouldn't say it would cure all your allergy problems. *Product comes with carbon filters, which I was surprised and bought some of my own, but great bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pet owners and small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these air purifiers and upon getting it set up and running purchased another just a couple days later. I also purchased one for my parents for Christmas. We have 3 cats and this greatly helps reduce pet dander, odors from the litter box, and other allergens and dust. It runs quietly in the background, almost like white noise. The filters are easy to replace (I just wish they came 2 or 4 to a box instead of 3 because it takes 2 filters). This is also a great healthy option for couple and families to simply purify the air in a small space. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Jean Keesling

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended !!
customer_reviews.text: I work in a cubical style office (open ceiling) and my air quality in my building is terrible. This year I developed lovely environmental allergies. So I decided to make my air quality better by buying this. Prior to this air purifier I would cough and sneeze even after taking my allergy meds. NOW i don't take my allergy meds and I don't cough or sneeze. I also point the fan that blows clean air away from me (its too cold right now maybe summer time I'll point is near my face) and it is not loud. I really believe this helps tremendously and Im glad I bought it. I have recommended it to all my coworkers.
customer_reviews.author: HRodi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean. First photo is after a good vacuum. Second is after wiping with disinfectant wipe. The filter is not replaceable and the outer edge is cardboard but the filter is made with rubber and covered in a thin layer of vinyl. I believe it’s helped with allergies and my home does have a fresher smell. Very glad I chose this. My febreeze model has very expensive replaceable filters. I’d also make sure to clean the front cover and let the unit and cover air dry before use
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work, but after 2 weeks it started making an electrical burning smell
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good machine, ran it for a couple weeks and checked the filter, it looks about 25% full from a very clean room to begin with. After running it for another day though, there began to be a bad electrical burning smell coming from it. We traced the smell to this purifier and decided to shut it off. Now it's put away until we get up the guts to keep running it while we're around. It may just need cleaning, but the filter isn't very bad at all. We'll test it and update later.
customer_reviews.author: Archer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little house helper!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing for the price and size! I'm so happy. We will be getting another for our upstairs. It takes out all traces of cooking odors in our house. Bacon, GONE! Garlic, GONE! You can't tell what we had for dinner the night before anymore. We have 4 birds, 3 cats, a rabbit and a dog. We clean it every couple of weeks with the vacuum. We get lots of hair and dust out of it. It definitely does the job!
customer_reviews.author: S&J_99

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been struggling recently with ridding my apartment of pet odor. I have used pet odor eliminating candles, sprays and nothing worked. This air purifier is INCREDIBLE! After turning it on high the smell was gone within an hour. Now, I leave it on low 24/7 and you can barely hear it. On high the sound is more noticeable but not bad. My mom visited recently and noticed there was no smell in my place and commented on how impressed she was. This has certainly been one of the best purchases I've made in quite a while!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Perry

customer_reviews.title: Works but would be better with washable filter
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about 3 months and honestly wasn't sure how well it would work. Its picked up a lot of dust in the time I've had it. I just wish the filter was washable with water. Vacuuming sounds ok but I feel as though it wont get every little thing out as it would rinsing it under a faucet. I'd probably like to replace the filter every 6 months or so if there are spare filters you can get.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Air Filter for my Asthmatic Toddler
customer_reviews.text: I cannot rave how much I love this air filter!!! We recently found out that our toddler is asthmatic, so we decided to get an air filter for her bedroom. After a lit research for on air quality and comparing prices we pucked this model and we are so grateful for it. Ever since we got it, there has virtually been no dust in the air of her bedroom, and the deodorizer is fantastic! It gives me a peace of mind that she can breath easy. It is well worth the price; such an amazing quality.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M

customer_reviews.title: Great little air filter
customer_reviews.text: This works well at removing dust and other particles from the air in my master bedroom. It has super quiet mode, medium mode (which is what I typically use, works great as a white-noise machine as well), and a loud mode that I use when I first turn it on while traveling. That's right, I take it on vacations with me (fits fine in suitcases). This lasted 3 years of frequent every day use until it developed a loud buzz that I couldn't get rid of (I'm assuming it had something to do with air travel damage), so I ended up buying a new one that works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: The description states that the filter can be vacuumed and no filters to buy and it has a permanent HEPA grade filter. This machine has 3 different kinds of filter. Only one of them is permanent and it's not the hepa grade one. It does appear that only the charcoal filters need to be replaced with any regularity and I assume that can just be ignored if you wish. Other than that, great little air purifier.
customer_reviews.author: Andy G

customer_reviews.title: Great for capturing hair and getting rid of litter smells!
customer_reviews.text: This filter is great. I was looking for something to trap pet hair flying around my apartment and this works very well. I have it near the litter box so I can turn it up to max whenever necessary and it makes quick work of any smells. I like the three speed settings, the Whisper Quiet is almost noiseless. I vacuumed the entire unit recently and was amazed at how much it captured. For the price, this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail M

customer_reviews.title: It’s not a real HEPA filter.
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed because it’s not a true HEPA filter system. The filter is just a regular filter and cardboard. The machine itself doesn’t in any way create a seal like you would expect with a air purifier machine. Ran the thing for three days in a 150sq foot room and still room had a musty smell to it. I even bought the suggested black carbon filters. It’s just not able to give desired results because it’s not properly sealed machine.
customer_reviews.author: CHAUNA

customer_reviews.title: They do what they say they do
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these for my house as we have a cat and a bird. I would say within 8 hours I could tell a little bit that the air was not as heavy or thick if that makes sense. I took the cover off and it is definitely catching junk in the air. I plan on getting a couple more for the other rooms. Allergy responses to the crap in the air have died down a bit to and if anyone lives in Texas the allergies can be pretty bad at times.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: It keeps my cat allergies under control
customer_reviews.text: I am allergic to cats but I love them so much! I have a cat that mostly stays in my room, which I love, but causes me to sneeze a lot. With this air purifier in my room, I have not been sneezing at all. It is fairly quiet but I do avoid running it overnight since I am a light sleeper. So I run in during the day sometimes instead. I do use charcoal filters for it to keep the product clean and to make it more efficient. My room is also very small, and the size of this air purifier is perfect for it as it is fairly small. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Basically just a fan
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product, and I got it because of all the great reviews it had. However, I’ve had this set up for quite awhile and I feel as though it’s done nothing. We have 2 dogs and 3 cats, so it gets plenty dusty and hairy. Even having this run non stop, there’s next to nothing on the filter. I don’t know if I just got a defective one, but ours is basically just an overpriced fan..
customer_reviews.author: Mitchy B

customer_reviews.title: Filter was clean after 3 weeks running straight
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product since a lot of people have posted their pictures of their filters covered with dust and hair. Well I have four cats and one dog and a smoker in my home and I used the product as intended and running it 3 weeks straight on the highest setting I took out the filter and the filter was clean. It looked like the way it was when I first got it, not one piece of dust or hair was trapped in the filter. I woupd figure at peast one hair would get picked up that doesn't seem like it's working to me so I had to return mine.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I really did my research on this product and it was worth it. I bought three. My house is small so they definitely clear out a room quickly when used on high. I like the option of placing it either horizontally or vertically and it's easily portable. I don't want to worry about replacement filters either, so this is practical as well. I bought the charcoal filters too. I turn these suckers on high when I'm cleaning and they suck and rogue dust right out of the air! I also noticed that there is WAY less dust the next day because it doesn't get a chance to fall back onto a surface after I'm done cleaning. VERY pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if it's doing anything!
customer_reviews.text: I'm baffled. It comes on, it appears to function as indicated, but I honestly don't know if I am getting purified air or wasting electricity. I put it near the HVAC return which may or may not be a good idea. I'm still sneezing and coughing from dust or something that is still in the air. I'm using at night in a bedroom that is under 200sf so I don't think it's an issue of the space being too big.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmo Jones

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty decent air purifier for the price. I’m very sensitive to dust and I can tell a difference in my breathing when I use it. I like the whisper setting when I sleep. It isn’t totally quiet, but it almost provides a gentle white noise. I wouldn’t want to leave the other settings on for long unless I was awake and playing TV/Music over it. I do wish it was easier to clean. As soon as I take the filter out of the machine I see dust going everywhere and have to quickly put the filter into a trash bag to clean so I don’t shake more dust back into the air.
customer_reviews.author: cierra white covena white

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Only owned the product for 2 months but it does the job. I bought 2 for the living and my son’s room since his allergies get him terribly sick. He hasn’t been ill since! I’m buying another for my room for my fiancée now that his allergies are bothering him!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny A Hellmers

customer_reviews.title: Work for me!
customer_reviews.text: OMG.. I was sneezing all the time after moving into a 40 year old property so I brought this air purifier and after almost 3 weeks I haven’t sneezed in days. Plus, the fan is strong enough on it that I use it to keep cool while I sleep. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie E.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little purifier
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little purifier. My dr recommended one to help alleviate my asthma symptoms that are caused by allergies. I’ve noticed a big difference since using this. I still use an inhaler occasionally but I’ve been able to wean myself off of my steroid one. I use it in my bedroom (since that’s where I spend the most time in my 500 sq ft apartment, and that’s where the dr. recommended I keep it). I’m thinking of getting 2 more for work and my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Lokii

customer_reviews.title: Allergies Gone
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. It is about 1.5 ft tall so it is pretty tall. The one thing I would change about it is that there is this plastic piece on the bottom on it (about a forth of a centimeter) that makes it a tad bit wobbly. Other than that it seems to work well (my allergies have gone away). I also love that you can just clean the filter rather than buying a new one (although I have not cleaned the filter yet).
customer_reviews.author: Vantheman00

customer_reviews.title: Downgraded
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for the pet version one, they used to have a black one. I got the black one now and it's not the pet version, doesn't have a hair or carbon odor filter either but costs the SAME. I feel misled or something, man.
customer_reviews.author: Filántropo Azteca

customer_reviews.title: Allergy sufferers rejoice!
customer_reviews.text: First time in a long time waking up able to breathe without pressure. I’ve tested out many, from high end to low, and this one is the best one I have ever come across. The “whisper clean” is fantastic, along with the super sleek design its a win for me! Compared to others that claimed to be not as noisy, yet turned out to be super annoying. This one is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: No difference with use
customer_reviews.text: Don’t feel it picking as much dust as it should since it still smells like pet (only one dog) and dust still collects on furniture and bedroom. Using only in a small bedroom on top of dog cage. Have tried moving different spaces in bedroom and see no difference. Have used it for 3/4 months straight
customer_reviews.author: marlene

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, get something better.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I've been running this in my small bedroom for a couple day now. Can't say I've noticed any difference unlike the Honeywell unit I bought for the living room. No charcoal filter means no odor removal. Don't know why they asked to rate that. As far as noise, on the lowest setting it's tolerable to sleep with, but it also doesn't move hardly any air. As far as the "Permanent HEPA Filter"? Read the fine print.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product! I was a bit hesitant because of the smaller size, but it works better than my old air purifier which was almost 3x the size. With 3 cats, plus living on a farm where I love having the windows open, my upstairs apartment in an old farmhouse gets very dusty very quickly. Even on the lowest setting, this purifier keeps the dust to a bare minimum. My older cat has allergies and her sneezing and itchy skin has also improved. The unit is very quiet as well. Extremely impressed!
customer_reviews.author: LoveCats&Books

customer_reviews.title: Better than I Expected
customer_reviews.text: I live in Mexico and the dust from the street is a pain. I have 2 dogs, one is a Mastif who sheds like crazy and covers my furniture and even my stove with hair. In addition , next door they are building which means pounding on concrete and the dust has been bad. I started my purifiar 10 days ago and I have had no hair on anything at all. The dust also is at a very low level with some areas of the room having none. I am using this in a large open living room-kitchen-dining area. I plan to get 3 more, one for each bedroom and another for the open area.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Holt

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: We have only used this air purifier for one night but I felt compelled to leave an excellent review! Our puppy must have known we needed to test the air filter out because he decided to poo in our bedroom for the first time in months (funny now, wasn't so funny then). After clean up, then air filter took the smell TOTALLY away. I can't speak for its durability since we only received it yesterday but its functionality is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Jaria

customer_reviews.title: Nice little machine ☺
customer_reviews.text: I'm editing my original review. It does collect dust and pet hair pretty well, and does a fair job on odors for it's size. I received a few questions in reference to clearing smoke right away for smokers who want to sneak or smoke cigarettes in the same home with a nonsmoker. I don't know of any air purifier that will allow that. But considering the size this thing is a great machine as far as keeping the air free of dust and pet hair. I just wish I could've ordered a larger size so I wouldn't have to change the filters so often. I keep my windows closed so it doesn't have to clear any outside dust or pollen.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This has been great. I gave several cats. After setting up the purifier, the air feels better. There just seems to be a cleaner smell and feel about the air. It must be the dust or hair level. Even my young grandsons noticed it. It is very quiet. Just a slight whisper. Definately recimmend
customer_reviews.author: leslie watters

customer_reviews.title: Good enough.
customer_reviews.text: We have this in a medical lab. We thought the HEPA filter was a good idea since the building is old. I'm less sniffly at work than I was before, so it's working. I'm not sure how the filter is meant to be washable since it seems to come in a cardboard casing. Guess we'll find out when the time comes to clean it. It's been running on high nonstop for 2 months and it sounds as smooth as on day 1, so it's probably good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Talkahuano

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've already noticed a huge difference when it comes to clearing out the smell of smoke in the "designated" office in our home. I wouldn't say it's noisy at all. It's more like white noise & we have it set on medium. If you put it on low, you can't hear it at all. I turn it on in the morning and leave it on for about 8-10 hours a day. Both of us are impressed with this Hamilton Beach Air Purifier. Will update it after we've used it for a longer period of time, but for now, it meets our needs and I've stopped coughing due to allergies.
customer_reviews.author: junipers

customer_reviews.title: Works well drawing in and letting out air
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this one to replace an old purifier. We wanted one that didn't need replacement filters every few months. This one works well; you can lay it flat or upright; and you can adjust it. We live in the west where's there's a lot of dust. After a month it needed vacuuming. Using the hose didn't remove all the dust as I had thought, and unfortunately you can't rinse the filter. We will continue to use the hose monthly. It does trap a lot of dust.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybird

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because we smoke in the house and keep reptiles, smoke is toxic to them and though we don't smoke in the room with them I wanted to be extra safe. I can tell a difference in the room already. Its like a breath of fresh air in your room. The noise is tolerable, it sounds like white noise or a fan, it doesn't bother me. Very nice for the price, will be buying another.
customer_reviews.author: DandyGeckos0823

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I mostly wanted it to help with dust and cat hair. I can really tell a difference. It ain't feels much better and cleaner with it on. I run it constantly. Easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well on high for 12x15 foot room
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it less than a week and my sinuses are happy. My bedroom was hazy in the morning sunlight with fire air and dust. This little unit is a powerhouse. I leave it on high day and night. If you look closely you can see the dust and crud it’s sucked up in less than a week. Would definitely recommend to a friend and I would purchase another one. It doesn’t do anything for odor elimination just FYI.
customer_reviews.author: meishan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome just love it!
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews on this product and others. I bought one to test it out. I thought it was awesome so I bought another. I have had no issues I could tell the difference in the first week but wanted to wait to give a review to make sure it was consistent. I keep both on high 24/7 high speed has more sound to it no more than a fan and has not disrupted my sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for laundry room where I have my kittie's litter box. Cannot close door to the room otherwise they couldn't get in. It is small, compact and does a fair job. I know it works because I have brush cleaned the filters a few times already. Have ordered 2nd set of filters, not expensive but I put off using them as long as I can clean filters that came with it. I use the filters for odor reducing purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has worked wonders for my allergies!!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a lifesaver for me. I recently moved to a new city and have always had horrible allergies. For weeks I was taking decongestant allergy medics and still having water eyes, sneezing, and drainage. I decided to get this air purifier and it has worked wonders! After the first day of using it I noticed my allergies getting better. I moved it to different rooms in my house originally to get everything neutral before leaving it in my living room. Best purchase of this year.
customer_reviews.author: Randi Reviews

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this! IT WORKS! My bedroom has always had a funky smell to it. We have had the carpet cleaned, replaced the mattress, etc. Still, it had its unique odor. I bought this for my daughter and her allergies. Before putting it in her room, I decided to test how well it really works by putting it in my room, thinking it wouldn't be able to fix the odor. We left the house. Came home a few hours later, ODOR FREE!!!! I can't believe it!! I am now keeping this one and purchasing a second one for my daughter. Thank you Hamilton Beach!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie09

customer_reviews.title: Cleaner home
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for five years now and it has held up like a champ! We turn this on anytime we cook or clean, and it helps tremendously. It draws much of the dust shaken loose while cleaning and releases cleaned air in its place. Helps a great deal with my allergies and asthma. I also get allergies and a cough when my wife or I cook dinner, so we throw this on full blast and it cleans the smells out of the air for easier breathing. Absolutely LOVE this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Nomad3304

customer_reviews.title: Great for cat owners in apartments
customer_reviews.text: Got this for winter months since it’s too cold to open the windows to cut down on pet dander in the air. I’m not allergic to cats but when you live in a cloud of it, it’s going to affect you. After having it running for a day I didn’t really notice a change, but when I opened it up to check if the filter was ok, I realized I hadn’t removed the plastic covering on the filter. Whoops. After setting it up correctly, after a couple days I noticed that I was breathing easier and had less mucus and stuffiness. I don’t know how much it does in the larger living space but its working great in the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: nopsis

customer_reviews.title: Would buy this again
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for the room we use for our multiple cats’ litter boxes. The clumping litter is very dusty & we put this in the room hoping it would help with the amount of dust we stir up cleaning the boxes a few times a day. It not only worked, it worked amazingly fast. Love it. The noise level even on high is not annoying. We wish we had bought this a long time ago. Highly recommend & definitely will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: stereo guy

customer_reviews.title: Check Preinstalled Filter before use!
customer_reviews.text: Came just as described. It has cut down on dust significantly and is very quite even on the highest setting! The only complaint I have is when we opened the product out of the box the filter was already installed and still had the plastic on the filter. We ran it for 3 days before checking it and realized this! There was nothing in the instructions that said to open it up and remove the plastic wrapping on the filter. I would have preferred that they would have let the customer install the filter if they weren’t going to tell you about that in the instructions. Other than that I would definitely recommend for a small living room or bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Rigsby

customer_reviews.title: Decent filter; Great price
customer_reviews.text: This is very compact and quite quiet. My only complaint would be that the air output is on only the left side and ends up angling the air stream slightly toward the side that has the air intake. I want this to circulate the whole room, not just recirculate the same air in front of it over again. i put it behind my tv at an angle so the fresh out is forced to the other side via the back of the tv. I recognize this is probably an advantage for some people, a non-issue for most, and was easy to work around for me, so I did not detract a star.
customer_reviews.author: switzertex

customer_reviews.title: Simple but effective air filter.
customer_reviews.text: This works by drawing air though a fiber filter. Dust in the air then accumulates on the filter and can be vacuumed off. The filter can be used repeatedly with periodic cleaning. I have noticed that I get sneezing jags less often since this has been working for a few months. At highest settings it produces a noticeable fan sound. At the lowest setting it is relatively quiet but in a very quiet room you might still hear some sound.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G.

customer_reviews.title: Far Cheaper Than New HEPA Filters
customer_reviews.text: I was spending upwards of $60 for one replaceable filter for another purifier I had. I don't know how I didn't realize this, but they make permanent HEPA filters. I picked this up, grabbed an extra pack of the charcoal filters (because they're $15 for three!), and it is worth every penny. I prefer the higher settings for the white noise, but if you put it on the lowest setting, you will think it isn't even on! It was SILENT.
customer_reviews.author: Katie G.

customer_reviews.title: Use the highest setting for white noise
customer_reviews.text: This really helps with my family’s allergies during when pollen is thick, and we use the highest setting for white noise when putting our toddler down for the night. There are some whisper quiet settings as well. Love this air purifier!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen H

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good so far (1 week use) *Update, after 6 months use*
customer_reviews.text: The product is very nice, except it is abit loud and the cable is ted short. It effectively eliminate odors at medium and high power. At low, it is quiet but does not do much work. *update* I changed the rating from 4 to 5 stars as I can definitely see dust particles building up on the filter even at low settings. I use a pre-filter which has activated carbon for odor absorption. The filter does turn black after some time with activated carbon pre-filter. If you are looking for air purifier for a small room or studio, this is way to go. It does eliminate odors efficiently with the pre-filter.
customer_reviews.author: ExterCy

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: My bedroom seems to have a lot of dust and I would always wake up in the night very congested and having trouble breathing. Well, no more. No more congestion. I just use this in my bedroom so I like the small size. It's also very quiet. I had read up on what to look for in an air purifier and this one fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel S. Druce

customer_reviews.title: Front cover restricts intake air flow
customer_reviews.text: So...the design of the front cover, on my unit at least, forces the majority of the filtration to occur at the top and bottom curved areas. The front, capsule shaped face plate seems to be intended to work as a venturi, directing and slightly accelerating air to trap the intake charge...but for some reason it concentrates around the rounded ends. I'd say 70% Also...I noticed quite a bit of dust around the cover seam, all around the filter housing seat, and a small but noticeable amount on the exhaust vent grill. The latter struck me as odd. Hepa filters are supposed to catch pretty fine particles.
customer_reviews.author: Dave S

customer_reviews.title: Does good. I'm
customer_reviews.text: What did I dislike about this product is that it's black I am low vision and so black items are a little difficult for me to operate it would have been better if it was white or would have had an option for a White one. What I like about it is that it is very quiet I have it on in our living room on low speed and you hardly know that it is running. It does a good job of keeping the air clean I know that because we have 2 dogs and it doesn't smell like a dog house in our home. I do recommend this her purifier it would be better if it was White.
customer_reviews.author: M Sim***

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet rat odor!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has 6 rats and even with regular cage cleanings, her room stays rather musty and dusty. Within a few hours of running this air purifier in her room, the smell is gone, the air feels cleaner, and I swear, you'd never know she has rats in there! She was worried about the noise, and I was concerned the "whisper" setting wouldn't be strong enough to keep the space clean, but we were both pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.author: M. A McLaughlin McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for allergies and if you need some air flow
customer_reviews.text: This is incredible. I was a little hesitant when reading the reviews because I really needed something that worked right now and not something I had to send back if damaged or just didn't work. The reason for this is because I have bad allergies to animals and basically everything they use especially my rabbits pine and hay. Well my rabbits live with me in my room since I am in a shared apartment. this thing worked almost immediately. I turned it on high for about an hour and slept with it on low. It was incredible how fast it worked!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to help with dust and dog hair - the difference in the room is very noticeable. They work best on "quick clean" which is rather loud, but the whisper setting is so quiet you don't know they are running. I have them in a great room that is 30 feet by 20 feet and between the two they really keep the air-borne particles down.
customer_reviews.author: tarcher61

customer_reviews.title: not that helpful
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's quiet, kinda. I had read the reviews on here and so many raved. I think the ravers might have been paid as I don't find it all that helpful. The dust in my small 2-room apt drives me nuts and the unit seems unable to handle it. I thought for the money, kinda pricey, it would work. I had used Eden Pure before this which did great work, but Very Pricey, and then broke and their service wasn't so hot. So good luck peops.
customer_reviews.author: chris g Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Remember to remove the plastic around the filter.
customer_reviews.text: After about a month, I removed the front panel to check the air filter and see if it was dirty. Imagine my surprise when I saw the filter was still wrapped in plastic. I rechecked the directions and saw no directions to open the front panel and remove the plastic. Common. Do something. Place a sticker by the power button or something.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Lowenstein

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I have a large dog and live in a home that gets fairly dusty. After running this nearly continuously around the house for about two weeks, the indicator showed halfway to needing the carbon filters replaced. I opened it up to see if the main filter needed vacuuming, and couldn't find one speck of dust in this thing. Looking at other reviews, it appears I'm not the only one who had this experience. But at the same time, others have found it effective. I did assemble it correctly so I don't know why mine seems to be nothing more than a fan. It also makes a pretty annoying high-pitched whine at higher speeds.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Great air filter
customer_reviews.text: My house seems to just retain the odor from the litter box, I clean the litter box at least 3 times a day and nothing was helping except leaving windows open. These purifiers are great after about 2 weeks of running the smell is 100% better, I had the air conditioner on when it was really hot and the smell didn't return. I walked in the house and it was a pleasure to return home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good air filter, just needs a handle.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good, small filter. It has a whisper clean setting that is very quiet. The only thing is that it needs a carrying handle. It is a funny shape and there is no where to grab. You need two hands to move it around even though it is small and light.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect air cleaner AND white noise generator to help you sleep
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one of these--nothing wrong with the first one I used for many years (took it to Salvation Army), but I am moving and I wanted to take a new one with me. I mainly need it because of the ambient noise it makes: it blocks out other sounds (such as my snoring cat) so that I can sleep! Just loud enough to do that, but not so loud that it is annoying--or so loud that you feel you can't hear things happening in the house that you might NEED to hear during the night. Small size, fits on nightstand, perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Carol F. Goodson

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach TrueAir Air Purifier for Home or Office with Permanent HEPA Filter for Allergies and Pets, Odor Eliminator, Ultra Quiet, 3 Filtration Stages, White (04384)
product_meta.description:
Style Name:TrueAir Specialized Pet & Odor EliminatorThe True Air Compact Air Purifier by Hamilton Beach offers 99.97% true HEPA cleaning performance in a compact design that fits anywhere in your home or office. Eliminate pesky pet odors and dander with the triple filtration technology that includes a permanent pre-filter to capture pet hair and large particles PLUS 2 zeolite filters to target pet odors, AND a permanent, HEPA-grade filter for capturing small particles as small as 3 microns. The permanent filters easily vacuum clean for minimal upkeep. Don’t let its compact size and ultra-quiet operation fool you – the True Air Compact Pet Air Purifier can provide powerful air cleaning to large rooms up to 140 square feet, making it ideal for bedrooms, nurseries, offices and dens. It’s not only compact and quiet, but it also works vertically or horizontally for maximum versatility.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The TrueAir Compact Air Purifier cleans and freshens the air in 3 ways:
1. The permanent pre-filter traps pet hair and large particles
2. Two replaceable carbon zeolite filters eliminate pet odors
3. A permanent 99% HEPA-grade filter captures smaller particles. This filter simply vacuums clean for minimal upkeep.
Simply vacuum the HEPA-grade filter for minimal upkeep. The two carbon zeolite odor-eliminating filters should be replaced every 3 months. As a convenient reminder, a timestrip cartridge counts down the 3 months and indicates when it is time to replace.
feature_bullets: High Performance True Hepa Grade Filter: Captures 99.97 Percent of Pet Dander, Dust, Dust Mites, Pollen, and Mold/Mildew Spores as Small as 3 Microns From the Air
Reduces Odors: 2 Activated Carbon Zeolite Filters Help Reduce Unwanted Household Odors From Pets, Smoke, and More
Quiet and Powerful: Use Whisper Clean for Extra Quiet Operation at Night, the Medium Setting or the Quick Clean Setting for More Powerful Air Cleaning
Easy to Clean: Permanent Hepa Filter Can Be Vacuumed Clean; No Replacement Filters to Buy
Versatile Air Care That Fits Anywhere: Position the Unit Vertically or Horizontally to Best Fit in Your Bedroom, Nursery, Hallway or Living Room at Home or at the Office up to 140 Square Feet
3 Filtration Stages: Permanent true HEPA filter captures dander & airborne particles plus 2 replaceable carbon zeolite filters to target pet odors plus a pre filter for pet hair and larger particles
Replacement Carbon Filters: When It Is Time to Replace the Filters, Choose From Model Numbers 04230g, 04231gw or 04234g; Simply Remove the Front of the Unit by Pressing Down the Opening Tab

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars6,131 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
